InstrumentManagerInterface

nodes.documentation: @dev Initializes the Instrument Manager.
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the address of Instrument Escrow.
nodes.name: getInstrumentEscrowAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Deactivates the instrument.
nodes.name: deactivate
setMakerWhitelist
setTakerWhitelist
createIssuance
engageIssuance
depositToIssuance
depositTokenToIssuance
withdrawFromIssuance
withdrawTokenFromIssuance
notifyCustomEvent
notifyScheduledEvent

createIssuance(bytes).details: Create a new issuance of the financial instrument

params.sellerParameters: The custom parameters to the newly created issuance

createIssuance(bytes).return: The id of the newly created issuance.

depositToIssuance(uint256,uint256).details: The caller deposits ETH, which is currently deposited in Instrument Escrow, into issuance.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token transfered

depositTokenToIssuance(uint256,address,u.details: The caller deposits ERC20 token, which is currently deposited in Instrument Escrow, into issuance.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token transfered
params.tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token

engageIssuance(uint256,bytes).details: A buyer engages to the issuance

params.buyerParameters: The custom parameters to the new engagement

getInstrumentEscrowAddress().details: Get the address of Instrument Escrow.

notifyCustomEvent(uint256,bytes32,bytes).details: Notify custom events to issuance. This could be invoked by any caller.

notifyScheduledEvent(uint256,bytes32,byt.details: Notify scheduled events to issuance. This could be invoked by Timer Oracle only.

params.eventName: Name of the scheduled event, eventName of EventScheduled event
params.eventPayload: Payload of the scheduled event, eventPayload of EventScheduled event

setMakerWhitelist(address,bool).details: Updates the maker whitelist. The maker whitelist only affects new issuances.

params.allowed: Whether this maker is allowed to create new issuance.
params.makerAddress: The maker address to update in whitelist

setTakerWhitelist(address,bool).details: Updates the taker whitelist. The taker whitelist only affects new engagement.

params.allowed: Whether this taker is allowed to engage issuance.
params.takerAddress: The taker address to update in whitelist

withdrawFromIssuance(uint256,uint256).details: The caller withdraws ETH from issuance to Instrument Escrow.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token transfered

withdrawTokenFromIssuance(uint256,addres.details: The caller withdraws ERC20 token from issuance to Instrument Escrow.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token transfered
params.tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token

devdoc.title: The interace of instrument manager. It serves as the interface between Instrument Registry and detailed implementation of Instrument Manager on each version.
